post:
FireVPS is a child initiative of ASTGD. Its main aim to provide a high quality virtual private server to its client with high specifications. FireVPS is also working to provide easy to use packages for SAAS. ASTGD is a registered software development company in Bangladesh since 2005.    
  
You will get Virtualizor control panel with all our VPS plans. All VPS users get dedicated IPv4 and IPv6 with full control over rDNS and no ports are blocked unless some abuse is being done.


#FireVPS KVM Offers

##KVM STANDARD  
-1024MB DDR3 RAM  
-2x vCPU  
-40GB HDD space  
-1500GB transfer  
-1Gbps Network  
-1x IPv4  
-KVM/Virtualizor  
-Original Price $9.99/Month  
__-$3.99/Month (Use Promo LETKVM)__  
Order link (https://firevps.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=8&promocode=LET1024)  
  

##KVM STARTER  
-512MB DDR3 RAM  
-1x vCPU  
-20GB HDD space  
-1000GB transfer  
-1Gbps Network  
-1x IPv4  
-KVM/Virtualizor  
-Original Price $5.99/Month  
__-$2.99/Month (Use Promo LETKVM)__  
Order link (https://firevps.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=7&promocode=LET512)  
  

##KVM BASIC

DDos protection from OVH  
Additional IP 2USD/mo  
Thanks
